languages.text: "Тьма уже пустила корни в твоей душе, и этого не исправить. Но ты все еще можешь принять ее — и запечатать глубоко внутри. Борись! И не поддавайся ей впредь".
"The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."
languages.original_text: "Тьма уже пустила корни в твоей душе, и этого не исправить. Но ты все еще можешь принять ее — и запечатать глубоко внутри. Борись! И не поддавайся ей впредь".

traits.locale_text: "The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And don't ever give in to it again."
"The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And don't ever give in to it again."
"The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."
"The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."
"The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."

languages.text: “黑暗已经在你的灵魂中生根发芽，再也无法彻底消灭。但你仍然可以接受它的存在，并将它永远封在心里。与它抗争吧！这一次，再也不要向它屈服。”
languages.original_text: "The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."

traits.locale_text: “黑暗已经在你的灵魂中生根发芽，再也无法彻底消灭。但你仍然可以接受它的存在，并将它永远封在心里。与它抗争吧！这一次，再也不要向它屈服。”

languages.text: «La oscuridad ya ha arraigado en tu alma, y eso no se puede deshacer. Pero aún puedes aceptarla y confinarla a lo más profundo de tu ser. ¡Lucha! Y no vuelvas a ceder a ella nunca más».
languages.original_text: "The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."

traits.locale_text: «La oscuridad ya ha arraigado en tu alma, y eso no se puede deshacer. Pero aún puedes aceptarla y confinarla a lo más profundo de tu ser. ¡Lucha! Y no vuelvas a ceder a ella nunca más».

languages.text: « Les ténèbres ont déjà pris racine dans votre âme et ne pourront pas être supprimées, mais vous pouvez encore l'accepter et la sceller au plus profond de vous-même. Luttez ! Et ne vous y abandonnez plus jamais. »
languages.original_text: "The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."

traits.locale_text: « Les ténèbres ont déjà pris racine dans votre âme et ne pourront pas être supprimées, mais vous pouvez encore l'accepter et la sceller au plus profond de vous-même. Luttez ! Et ne vous y abandonnez plus jamais. »

languages.text: "Die Dunkelheit hat in Eurer Seele bereits Wurzeln geschlagen, und das lässt sich nicht rückgängig machen. Aber Ihr könnt sie immer noch akzeptieren und tief in Euch versiegeln. Kämpft! Und gebt Ihr nie wieder nach."
languages.original_text: "The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."

traits.locale_text: "Die Dunkelheit hat in Eurer Seele bereits Wurzeln geschlagen, und das lässt sich nicht rückgängig machen. Aber Ihr könnt sie immer noch akzeptieren und tief in Euch versiegeln. Kämpft! Und gebt Ihr nie wieder nach."

languages.text: 「闇はすでにお前の魂に根を下ろしており、元に戻すことはできない。だが、それを受け入れ、心の奥底に封印することはできる。戦え！そして二度と屈服するな」
languages.original_text: "The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."

traits.locale_text: 「闇はすでにお前の魂に根を下ろしており、元に戻すことはできない。だが、それを受け入れ、心の奥底に封印することはできる。戦え！そして二度と屈服するな」

languages.text: "Karanlık, ruhunda kök salmış. Oradan çıkmayacak fakat hâlâ durumunu kabullenip onu derinlere gömebilirsin. Savaş! Bir daha asla ona teslim olma."
languages.original_text: "The darkness has already taken root inside your soul, and it cannot be undone. But you still can accept it and seal it deep inside. Fight! And do not ever give in to it again."

traits.locale_text: "Karanlık, ruhunda kök salmış ve artık geri alınamaz. Fakat hâlâ durumunu kabullenip onu derinlere gömebilirsin. Savaş! Bir daha asla ona teslim olma."
